projects.name: STARWHAL: Just the Tip
projects.blurb: Retro, epic narwhal battle in space! The heart-piercing action is furious and unrelenting. STARWHAL will change your life.

projects.name: Wild Season - Inspired by Harvest Moon
projects.blurb: Inspired by Harvest Moon Games. We aim to bring an immersive Farming experience focused on story, relationships and more.

projects.name: Revival Survival! - Official RRE arcade game; starring YOU!
projects.blurb: Revival Survival - The Revival Retro Events arcade project, starring YOU!

projects.name: Piye Chronicles - A Unique Action Game For Mobile Platforms
projects.blurb: Piye Chronicles will be an action-packed side-scrolling  game for iOS & Android, based on the Chronicles of Piye comics & graphic novel

projects.name: The Hat Man: Shadow Ward
projects.blurb: The story is real. The fear is real. This survival horror game tests whether you can keep it together, avoid danger and save your soul.

projects.name: Tower of Elements 2 for PC, Mac, and Linux
projects.blurb: ToE2 is a real time strategy and puzzle game with deep city building and match-3/tower defense combat. Lead your kingdom to glory!

projects.name: MiniCiv, 4X game for Android
projects.blurb: A 3D 4X strategy game for Android tablets and phones, designed to play like a PC game!

projects.name: My Little Dictator: A Battle-Visual Novel
projects.blurb: A romantic-comedy battle visual novel set in fictional WW2 Europe. Featuring RPG battles, map systems and plenty of light-hearted fun.

projects.name: Pixelsphere - A Musical Adventure
projects.blurb: A classic pixel art platformer and generative music experience where the soundtrack changes with how you play the game. (Mac/Win)

projects.name: Sunrider - A Space Visual Novel/Tactical RPG
projects.blurb: Captain your star ship and lead your squad of mecha pilots to victory.

projects.name: Reclaim the Darkness Mobile Game
projects.blurb: RD is a card-fighting game. The little rookie princess,Lilith,tryed to defeat the local lairds and recapture her territory

projects.name: Islands of Chaos - The Strategic Adventure Mobile App
projects.blurb: Stranded on a deserted island with 16 - 24 players you will engage in tropical minigames to determine who will be the island champion!

projects.name: Starship Tranquility ::Sci Fi RPG
projects.blurb: A fun sci-fi RPG with a simple turn-based combat style where you are the captain of an outlaw spaceship and crew of eccentric misfits.

projects.name: Zambies - Minecraft Server
projects.blurb: Repel waves of deadly Zombies with an exciting range of unlockable weapons, equipment and perks.

projects.name: Final Quest Part II : RPG Alternate Ending
projects.blurb:
Final Fantasy 6 Style RPG with all of the intense drama of modern RPG's
We are also building a fan page www.rpgvideo.co.uk

projects.name: Novus AEterno: MMO 4X RTS The Largest Strategy Game Ever.
projects.blurb: Negotiate, Trade, Dominate, Deceive in a Persistent Universe with thousands of players.

projects.name: War of Omens - A Digital Deck-Builder/CCG, BACKER BETA LIVE!
projects.blurb: War of Omens is a card game combining deck-builder and CCG mechanics, featuring fast, strategic play and 3 different playable factions.

projects.name: Long Night
projects.blurb: Long Night is a third person survival horror with traditional and original features making it a unique horrific experience.

projects.name: Project Nimbus
projects.blurb: Take to the sky in this high speed mech action game. Dodge bullets, intercept missiles, defeat your enemies and save the Earth.

projects.name: Night of the Dead 2
projects.blurb: A free to play cooperative survival game available on the Starcraft II Arcade (no Starcraft II purchase necessary).
